summary: A small island located north of Skyrim. Sialuk has a treasure there, but alas fortune turned against him and now Bandits overrun the small island.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Sialukâ€™s Island[/b]

This is my first modding attempt for Skyrim. The island is relatively small and it has a couple of bandits and a treasure to be found; Sialuk was obsessed with his treasure and figured that if he kept it in a chest in a far off island then he could hide it forver, alas his luck ran low when he was captured by bandits.

You can travel to the island by going North West from Dawnstar and finding the rowboat with the manual; just activate the manual and you will find yourself in the island be ready to face an offense quickly.

I hope you enjoy this mod, feedback is welcome,
[i]Lucky[/i]

[color=teal][b]If you downloaded version 1 please download version 2. Version 1 doesn't contain critical files for the proper work of the mod and thus I screwed up my first release by overlooking a detail. I apologize for any inconvenience and I hope you will give the mod a second chance.

Sincerely, Lucky[/b][/color]
author: Lucky Red - Sialuk
